msgSnippet: sounds like a question for the ant list to me... ... From: suresh [mailto:jsdk00@yahoo.com] Sent: Tuesday, November 26, 2002 9:54 AM To: junit@yahoogroups.com
messageBody:
sounds like a question for the ant list to me...

-----Original Message-----
From: suresh [mailto:jsdk00@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 26, 2002 9:54 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] class not found exception


hi i am trying to run a Junit test case from the ant script and
i got
following error. All my files are placed in d:\src directory
without
any package names. TempTest is name of the class. any
suggestions
please ?

<junit printsummary="yes" fork="yes" haltonfailure="no">
<formatter type="plain"/>
<test name="D:/src/TempTest" outfile="result">
</test>
</junit>

</target>

error message:
Testsuite: D:/src/TempTest
Tests run: 1, Failures: 0, Errors: 1, Time elapsed: 0 sec

Caused an ERROR
D:/src/TempTest
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: D:/src/TempTest
at java.lang.Class.forName0(Native Method)
at java.lang.Class.forName(Class.java:115)
